column2: "Na afei
column3: Israel
column4: hom ntsie ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu a mekyerɛkyerɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ no; na hom eenya nkwa
column5: na hom akɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE
column6: hom egyanom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no."

column2: "Mma hom mmfa hwee nnka asɛm a merehyɛ hom yi ho
column3: nkyii so mma hom nyi do bi
column4: na hom eedzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom yi do."

column2: "Hom enyiwa ehu dza osian Baal-peor ntsi EWURADZE yɛe; na nyimpa a wodzii Baal-peor ekyir no nyinara
column3: EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asɛɛ hɔn efi hom mu."

column2: "Na hom a hom takyeer EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ho no dze
column3: hom nyinara tse ase ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Hwɛ makyerɛkyerɛ hom ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ me no ara
column4: dɛ hom nyɛ dɛm wɔ asaase a hom rokɔ do akɛfa no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi do na hom nyɛ; na iyi nye hom nyansaa nye hom ntseasee wɔ aman a wɔbɛtse ahyɛdze yi nyinara enyim
column3: na wɔbɛse dɛ
column4: Ampaara ɔman kɛse yi yɛ nyansa nye nyimdzee man."

column2: "Na ɔman kɛse bɛn na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ nyame a ɔbɛn hɔn dɛm
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn tse wɔ aber biara a yɛfrɛ no no?"

column2: "Na ɔman kɛse bɛn na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu tsenenee dɛ mbrɛ mbra yi nyinara a medze risi hom enyim ndɛ da yi tse?"
"Hom ho yie ara na nhwɛ
column3: na hom nsie hom kra yie
column4: bɛyɛ na hom werɛ efir ndzɛmba a enyiwa hunii no
column5: na bɛyɛ na efi hom akoma mu hom nkwa nda nyinara mu; mbom ma wo mba nye wo mba hɔn mba nhu;"

column2: "da a hom gyinaa EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ Horeb
column3: aber a EWURADZE see me dɛ
column4: Boaboa ɔman no ano ma me
column6: na woeesuasua dɛ wosuro me wɔ nda a wɔdze tse ase wɔ asaase do nyinara
column7: na wɔdze akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mba no."

column2: "Na hom twee pinii na hom begyinaa bepɔw no ase; ber a bepɔw no dzɛɛw gya kɔr sor tɔnn
column3: sum
column4: mununkum

column2: "Na EWURADZE fi gya no mu kasaa kyerɛɛ hom: hom tsee ne nsɛm ndze
column3: na no su dze hom ennhu; ne ndze nko na hom tsee."

column2: "Na ɔkaa n'ahyɛmu a ɔhyɛɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ no kyerɛɛ hom
column3: mekyerɛ mbransɛm du no; na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ abopon ebien do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hyɛɛ me aber no mu dɛ menkyerɛkyerɛ hom ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu
column3: na hom aayɛ no wɔ asaase a hom rutwa mu akɛfa no do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ homho yie papa; osiandɛ hom ennhu su biara da no a EWURADZE fi ogya no mu kasaa kyerɛɛ hom wɔ Horeb no:"
"bɛyɛ na hom asɛɛ homho
column3: na hom ayɛ ohonyi a wɔasen wɔ adze biara no su mu ama hom ho
column4: ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa saso
column6: "abowa biara a ɔwɔ asaase do ne saso
column7: etubowa biara a otu wɔ wimu ne saso
column9: "adze biara a ɔwea famu ne saso
column10: nam biara a ɔwɔ nsu mu wɔ asaase ase ne saso:"

column2: "na bɛyɛ na hom ama hom enyiwa do wɔ sor
column3: na sɛ hom hu ewia nye bosoom
column4: nye nworaba
column5: mekyerɛ sor dɔm no nyinara a
column6: wɔatwe hom ma hom akɔsɔr hɔn
column8: dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyehyɛ ama aman nyinara wɔ asaase nyina do no."

column2: "Hom dze
column3: EWURADZE afa hom
column4: na oeyi hom efi dadze fononoo mu
column5: efi Egypt dɛ hom mbɛyɛ n'egyapadze mma no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Nkyii so hom ntsi EWURADZE nyaa me ebufuw
column3: na ɔkaa ntam dɛ murunntwa Jordan
column4: na moronnkɔ asaase pa no a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no do."

column2: "Emi dze muruwu wɔ asaase yi do
column3: murunntwa Jordan: na hom dze wobotwa
column4: na wɔakɛfa asaase pa no."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ hom ho yie
column3: bɛyɛ na hom werɛ efir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu a ɔnye hom dzii no
column4: na hom ayɛ ohonyi a wɔasen wɔ adze bi a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn abra wo no su do ama woho."

column2: "Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yɛ ogya a ɔmen
column3: Nyame nyinkufo a."

column2: "Sɛ hom wowo mba
column3: na hom mba so wo mba
column4: na hom kyɛr wɔ asaase no do
column6: na wɔyɛ ohonyi a wɔasen wɔ adze biara no su do
column7: na hom yɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyiwa do

column2: "mefrɛ sor nye asaase dɛ wondzi hom dase ndɛ da yi
column3: dɛ ɔhera na hom bɛhera ntsɛmara wɔ asaase a hom rutwa Jordan akɛfa no do; hom nda ronnwar wɔ do
column4: mbom ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ pasapasa."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɔbɔ hom apetse aman mu
column3: na ɔbɛka hom nyimpa kakrabaabi wɔ amanaman mu mbrɛ EWURADZE begya hom akɔ no."

column2: "Na hɔ na hom bɔsom enyame
column3: nyimpa nsaano edwuma
column4: ndua nye abo a wonnhu

column2: "Na sɛ hom fi hɔ hwehwɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a
column3: hom bohu no
column4: sɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara hwehwɛ n'ekyir kwan a."

column2: "Sɛ hom wɔ ahohia mu
column3: na ndzɛmba yi nyinara ba hom do a
column4: nda a odzi ekyir no mu no nsan mbra EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nkyɛn

column2: "na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yɛ mbɔbɔrhufo Nyankopɔn; ɔremmpa hom
column3: nkyii so ɔrennsɛɛ hom
column4: no werɛ rimmfir hom egyanom ahyɛmu a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn no so."

column2: "Na afei hom nkaa tsetse nda a etwa mu kɔ no
column3: fitsi da a Nyankopɔn bɔɔ nyimpa wɔ asaase do
column4: na ofi ɔsor n'ano kor kodu kor so
column5: kyerɛ dɛ biribi esi a ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ adze kɛse yi tse
column6: anaa wɔatse dza ɔnye no sɛ?"

column2: "Ana ɔman bi atse Nyankopɔn ndze dɛ ofi gya mu rekasa pɛn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom atse no
column4: na woenya nkwa?"

column2: "Ana Nyankopɔn  asɔ ahwɛ dɛ ɔbɔkɔ akɛfa ɔman bi efi ɔman kor so bi mu afa
column3: wɔ nsɔhwɛ
column4: nsɛnkyerɛdze
column10: dɛ mbrɛ dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yɛe maa hom wɔ Egypt wɔ hom enyiwa mu no nyinara tsetsee a?"
column11: "#4.34 NYANKOPƆN: Binom kyerɛ ase dɛ “Ana onyame bi."

column2: "Hom na wɔdze kyerɛɛ hom
column3: ma hom eehu dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn; obi nnyi hɔ bio ka no ho."

column2: "Ofi sor maa hom tsee ne ndze
column3: ma ɔaakyerɛkyerɛ hom: na asaase do na ɔmaa hun ne gya kɛse no; na ofi gya no mu na etsee ne nsɛm."

column2: "Na osiandɛ ɔdɔɔ hom egyanom ntsi
column3: na ɔpaa hɔn asefo a wodzi hɔn ekyir no na ɔdze n'enyim nye no tum kɛse no
column4: yii hom fii Egypt;"

column2: "dɛ orubotutu amanaman a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔyɛ dzen sen hom efi enyim
column3: dɛ ɔdze hom rokɔ mu
column4: dze hɔn asaase akɛma hom dɛ ewungyadze
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhu ndɛ da yi
column3: na hom mfa nto hom akoma mu
column4: dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn wɔ sor nye asaase do: na obi nnyi hɔ bio."

column2: "Na hom ndzi dzi n'ahyɛdze
column3: nye ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi do
column4: na eesi hom yie
column5: na ɔnye hom mba a wodzi ekyir
column6: na hom nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no do daa."

column2: "Nna Moses yiyii nkurow ebiasa wɔ Jordan egya a odzi ba wipuei no;"
"dɛ onyimpakumfo a okum no nyɛnko awerɛfir mu
column3: na ɔnntan no dada bi no
column4: nguan nkɔ hɔ; na sɛ oguan kɔ nkurow yi kor mu a

column2: "ɔno nye yi
column3: oyii Bezer wɔ sar no do
column4: wɔ ɔman tɛtɛr no mu maa Reubenfo; na Ramot wɔ Gilead
column5: maa Gadfo; na Golan wɔ Basan maa Manaasɛfo."

column2: "Na iyi nye mbra a Moses dze too Israelmba enyim:"
"iyinom nye dase
column3: nye ahyɛdze
column4: nye ntsɛmbu a Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba
column5: wɔ aber a wofii Egypt bae no;"

column2: "wɔ Jordan egya
column3: Bɛt-peor tsentsendo ɔbɔn no mu
column4: wɔ Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtsenaa Hesbon a Moses nye Israelmba kum no wɔ aber a wofii Egypt bae no

column2: "na wɔfaa n'asaase no yɛɛ hɔndze
column3: na Basan hen Ɔge asaase no Amorifo ahemfo beenu no a wɔwɔ Jordan egya a odzi ba wipuei no;"

column2: "ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ano no araa dze kodu bepɔw Sion a ɔnoara nye Hermon no ho
column4: "nye Araba nyinara wɔ Jordan egya boka afamu
column5: mekyerɛ ɔdze kodu Araba epo ho
